name: RedSeal
description: This app integrates with RedSeal to implement investigative and polling actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Submit a query to fetch security impact, access details and threat details between two endpoints
actions.verbose:
For run query, "source" and "destination" parameter takes input as described:
  • For types All Subnets, All Trusted Subnets and All Untrusted Subnets, no input parameter needs to be provided for "source" and "destination"

  • For types Host and Device, Tree ID needs to be provided for "source" and "destination"

  • For type Subnet, ID needs to be provided for "source" and "destination"

  • For type Group, redseal data path needs to be provided for "source" and "destination" eg. "Subnet/Trusted", "Primary Capability/Host"

  • For type Address range, parameter can be provided as IP, Netmask and Address Range for "source" and "destination"
      eg.
    • "10.10.10.1"
    • "10.10.1.15/24"
    • "10.10.1.1-10.10.2.255"

example_values: Impact details found. Access details found. Threat details found.

actions.verbose: Action will add all the "Zone Pair Access Details" for which "Zone Pair Status" is Warning or Fail and "Zone Pair Access Details" status is not APPROVED.

container_count.description: Maximum number of containers to ingest

actions.description: List all subnets of a given type
actions.verbose: For type Unmapped Hosts, the "Tree ID" obtained has to be used as input parameter for query actions with type Host.

actions.description: List all devices of a given type
